subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Italy’s Carolina Kostner won the women’s event Saturday at the NHK Trophy, where the world champion Miki Ando of Japan finished fourth and failed to qualify for the Grand Prix final.
snippet: Italy’s Carolina Kostner won the women’s event Saturday at the NHK Trophy, where the world champion Miki Ando of Japan finished fourth and failed to qualify for the Grand Prix final.
